== Kadannappalli (CT) (627222) ==

Kadannappalli (CT) is a town in the [[Kannur]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 18.08 sq. km. and harbouring 2606 households with total population of 10430 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 35 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 530 km. Male population is 4848 and female population is 5582. Scheduled Caste population is 343 and Scheduled Tribes population is 41. Census Location Code of the town is 627222<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 36 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 120 km. Railway station is at Pazhayangadi at a distance of 12 km.
